description: This bar is located on the 39th floor of the Four Seasons Hotel. Enter through the hotel’s main entrance. The elegant interior and refined décor create a truly gorgeous atmosphere. The staff are friendly and speak good English, so you’ll feel comfortable even if you don’t speak Japanese.

product1.description:
ヴェルテュ マティーニ
Japanese Gin & Vodka, French Vermouth, Hinoki Bitter
国産ジン＆ウォッカ、フレンチベルモット、ビター
30% ABV
product1.name: VIRTU MARTINI

product2.description:
フィグコニャック＆スパイス
Cognac, Figs, Spices, Japanese Black Tea, Clarified Milk
コニャック、無花果、スパイス、和紅茶、クラリファイドミルク
9% ABV
product2.name: FIG COGNAC & SPICES
